corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

sentence.text: He is supposed to have stated , when rebuked by his chaplain , ` When I swear , I swear not as a bishop but as a country gentleman and a baronet " .
She rebuked him for being so long .
They were shooed away by the Sheikha , who rebuked them for being naughty and greeted me almost in the same breath .
He swooped on Preminger who rebuked him for being drunk , raging , ` You ver drunk last night and you are drunk now . "
They were concerned least the Shah should think that they were rebuking him for comparing him unfavourably with them of steel .
She had rebuked him for drinking a bit too much beforehand .
He walked back along the path , rebuking himself for entertaining Mrs Diamond 's lurid notions .
From long experience he knew the hangover would pass before it was time for him to stalk on stage and rebuke Hamlet for grieving overmuch for his father .
He rebuked me for liking it .
THE Advertising Standards Authority yesterday rebuked two organisations for making bogus claims about the health advantages of milk , writes James Erlichman .
YOUR profile writer rebukes our politicians for neglecting the people 's wishes in the matter of hanging .

He rebuked himself for his stupidity .
Kalchu was ashamed of his drunkenness and Chola grumbled and rebuked him for it .

However much , privately , she may have hated seeing her husband drink , or hearing him swear , she would never rebuke him in front of others .

Dairy council and Boots rebuked over advertising .

When he sets out from Rivendell Boromir blows his horn , the family heirloom , and is rebuked by Elrond for doing so ; but he takes no notice .

He rebuked me again .
President Chaim Herzog rebuked Mellor and a lunch in his honour at Israel 's parliament was cancelled .
The other rebuked his fellow victim and , recognising the innocence of Jesus , requested Jesus to remember him .
He commanded the weather and rebuked the demons .

Her eyes rebuked him .
